Newbie Guide:
Are you ready for a new mission?
After swapping the Weapon Exchange Ticket you received previously with the Non-Grade Shadow Weapon, go visit Zerstorer Marcela at the North Gate of Kamael Village and return once you have defeated the monsters on the Golden Hill. To find Zerstorer Marcela, follow the arrow above your head. I will tell you more later.
Can I help you with anything else?
Ask for advice.
Find NPC.
Receive Blessing of Protection.
Teleport to another village.
View available Support Magic.
Ask about Newbie Shadow Weapons and Armor.
